mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.LAWYER_ID, B.BOARD_STATUS FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON R.USER_ID = 'user_001' WHERE B.USER_ID = 'user_001' AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'DONE' AND B.LAWYER_ID IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM REVIEW R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{lawyerId}, #{score}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{boardNo})
